channels.name: ‚åõ-how-to-play
channels.topic: Want to know what Cyclic is all about? You've come to the right place.
channels.default_message:
**So, what is Assassin?**

1. Each player will receive one target whom you must eliminate through various 'kill methods'.
2. If you successfully assassinate your target, using one of the kill methods described in üíÄ-kill-methods, you receive a reward and a new target (your target's former target).
	- Assassinating your target removes them from the game.
3. In order to prevent the game from stalling, there will be a weekly  Town Hall phase (Sunday 00:00 CDT -> 23:59 CDT)
	- Players vote for various new kill methods players have proposed throughout the week.
	- A portion of the players with the least kills are eliminated by vote. 
	- Participation is optional, but participants are rewarded.
	- See üè´-town-hall-info for specific information.
4. At the end of the game, two players will have each other as targets, and whoever kills the other will be crowned the champion and receive a large reward. (if for some reason the game ends with more players, all those remaining will win)

**How to join Cyclic Games Assassin**

**Before you join**

**You *do not* have to attend anything to play the game, it's all throughout the next few weeks. So, if you're busy a certain day, it's fine.**
**1.** Register an account and fill in the necessary information at http://www.cyclic.games/autoJoin/2.
	 - You **MUST** use your @illinois.edu email to verify that you are a student.
	- If you do not use the link above, manually join game number 00000002.
**2.** Venmo $5.50 to @Evan-Coats. Make sure to include your __discord tag__ in the message, so we can confirm who sent the money.
	- This amount is **REFUNDABLE** if you do not play the game, so you have nothing to lose if you decide against playing!
	- Note that you can win money back from the game *without* winning the whole game.
**3.** If the staff does not add you to the @active game member role, please contact them in #üé§-general.
**4.** Check out the rules of the game in #üìã-rules.
